# -*- CMakeLists.txt generated by CodeLite IDE. Do not edit by hand -*-

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

# Project name
project(rGUI)

# This setting is useful for providing JSON file used by CodeLite for code completion
set(CMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS 1)

# Set default locations
set(CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}//cmake-build-Debug/output)
set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})
set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})
set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})

set(CONFIGURATION_NAME "Debug")

# Projects


# Top project
# Define some variables
set(PROJECT_rGUI_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}")
set(WORKSPACE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/")



#{{{{ User Code 1
# Place your code here
#}}}}

include_directories(
    .
    .

)


# Compiler options
add_definitions(-pg)
add_definitions(-g)
add_definitions(-O0)
add_definitions(-W)
add_definitions(-std=c++14)
add_definitions(-Wall)

# Linker options


if(WIN32)
    # Resource options
endif(WIN32)

# Library path
set(CMAKE_LDFLAGS "${CMAKE_LDFLAGS} -L. ")

# Define the CXX sources
set ( CXX_SRCS
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/Widget.cpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/Scene.cpp
)

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -pg -g -O0 -W -std=c++14 -Wall")

if(WIN32)
    enable_language(RC)
    set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILE_OBJECT
        "<CMAKE_RC_COMPILER> ${RC_OPTIONS} -O coff -i <SOURCE> -o <OBJECT>")
endif(WIN32)



#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

add_library(rGUI SHARED ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS} ${C_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(rGUI ${LINK_OPTIONS})


# Adding POST_BUILD commands
add_custom_command(
    TARGET rGUI
    POST_BUILD
    COMMAND )
add_custom_command(
    TARGET rGUI
    POST_BUILD
    COMMAND rm ${WORKSPACE_PATH}bin/Debug/ || true)
add_custom_command(
    TARGET rGUI
    POST_BUILD
    COMMAND mkdir ${WORKSPACE_PATH}bin/ || true)
add_custom_command(
    TARGET rGUI
    POST_BUILD
    COMMAND mkdir ${WORKSPACE_PATH}bin/Debug/ || true)
add_custom_command(
    TARGET rGUI
    POST_BUILD
    COMMAND cp ${WORKSPACE_PATH}/*.h ${WORKSPACE_PATH}bin/Debug/ || true)
add_custom_command(
    TARGET rGUI
    POST_BUILD
    COMMAND cp ${WORKSPACE_PATH}cmake-build-Debug/output/*.so ${WORKSPACE_PATH}bin/Debug/ || true)



#{{{{ User Code 3
# Place your code here
#}}}}
